dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Hold your fire, now. We'll chase them down as soon as we get a clear shot.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Good morning, let's clean some guns~ Make sure they're in tip-top shape! We don't want them to jam in the middle of a fight, right?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Want to go practice shooting after lunch? Bullets sure are expensive, but it can't be more expensive than your life, right?
Seriously, though. Do you actually feel like these are that pricey? Huh... that's funny. I was actually pretty surprised because they were much cheaper than I thought they'd be.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
It's getting dark outside... Looks like the speech is about to start~
We'll leave the leader to Heathcliff and focus on handling the worshipers who'll likely rush us after the deed is done. You remember the plan, right?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Atelier Logic is acceptable, but I wouldn't compare them to the S-class Workshops.
I once saw an S-class firearm my big brother somehow managed to get his hands on, and it was much better than the ones we're using in our Office.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
The real selling point of our Office is that we can quickly mow down weaker enemies who can't react fast enough to bullets.
Oh, what about enemies who can react to bullets? We'll run, of course~

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: I don't think the Head wants people to die anticlimactically. But what is an anticlimactic death anyway? We can put all kinds of meaningful labels on deaths, but it's still death at the end of the day.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Ha ha, were you feeling safe back there because bullets can't penetrate steel?
I have some bad news for you... shattering steel does not break the Head's taboo~

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I know it's tragic, but there are some covers where you shouldn't just jump out like that. Having your gear destroyed while trying to adjust your position is just... unfortunate, isn't it?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hm? We're out of both cash and ammunition? Ha ha... Looks like I'm going to have to give my family a call~

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Three shots to the chest, and... doesn't look like I'll even need to shoot them in the head for good measure.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: It's been a while since I was under someone else's command.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Cover me, please~

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Nervous? Take a deep, deep breath—it'll help.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Target in sight. One O'clock.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: You don't really know what you're doing, do you~?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ugh...!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Next target.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Looks like I was the one who was made light of…

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Everything can be made manageable with a plan.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Hmm~ That didn't work out. What now?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: That sure was a rightful victory. Is everyone alright?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Contract fee plus safeguard fee minus bullet costs... Wow~ looks like I won't have to make up for the losses with my own funds this time!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg:
Abort contract. Everyone, fall back!
What's that in your hand? Oh. Like I said, we can always buy new guns. Just discard it, it'll only slow you down.
